cause.description:
This is to help Ben Turkovic, famed drummer of world renowned rock band Inocherent, get a new electronic drumset, a Roland TD-20S. We need to make $5,000. This is so he can play day and night and get practice 24/7
1. All drummers should be able to play 24/7
2. Practice makes perfect
cause.mission: Help Ben Get A Roland TD-20S
cause.name: The "Ben Need New Kit" Program
